titles.title: Older Americans Prescription Drug Tax Relief Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow medicare beneficiaries a refundable credit against income tax for the purchase of outpatient prescription drugs.
Older Americans Prescription Drug Tax Relief Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Older Americans Prescription Drug Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income-based credit ($1,000 maximum per eligible individual) for the purchase of outpatient prescription drugs not covered by Medicare or insurance by persons eligible for Medicare.
